meanings.definition: A person who publicly demonstrates strong objection or disapproval.
meanings.sent1: The protestors gathered outside the government building to show their disapproval.
meanings.sent2: The protestors marched peacefully through the streets, holding up signs.
meanings.sent3: The protestors wore funny hats to make their objection more noticeable.
meanings.sent4: The sea of protestors flooded the square, a powerful display of dissent.
meanings.sent5: The image of the protestors chanting will forever be etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: Those who participate in protests or demonstrations.
meanings.sent1: Many protestors came from different cities to join the demonstration.
meanings.sent2: The protestors raised their voices together, demanding change.
meanings.sent3: The protestors brought colorful banners to make the protest more lively.
meanings.sent4: The protestors stood like a wall of determination, unyielding in their cause.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the protestors echoed through the streets, a call for justice.
